remarks: A deduction for showing two numbers whose squares are equal are themselves equal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Apr-2015.)
statement:
sqeqd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
sqeqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
sqeqd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( B ^ 2 ) ) $.
sqeqd.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ ( Re ` A ) ) $.
sqeqd.5 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ ( Re ` B ) ) $.
sqeqd.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( Re ` A ) = 0 /\ ( Re ` B ) = 0 ) -> A = B ) $.
sqeqd $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
